snippet.title: Amethyst Hearth OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
I really really REALLY wanted to make a sappy Hallmark Christmas special but with a robot for the romantic lead instead of a guy.  I thought it would be interesting.  So far, it has been.

I also wanted to mess about with RPG Maker some more, and honestly I wish I'd started using it earlier because it is so wonderful. 

DOWNLOAD THE DEMO AND/OR PURCHASE THE GAME ON ITCH.IO : https://sciaenops.itch.io/amethyst-hearth
